General.Name: Farmmi Inc
General.Description: Farmmi, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, processes and sells agricultural products in China, the United States, Japan, Canada, Europe, Korea, and the Middle East. The company offers shiitake and Mu Er mushrooms; and other edible fungi products, including bamboo fungi, agrocybe aegerila, pleurotus eryngii, coprinus comatus, grifola frondosa, and hericium erinaceus. It also operates Farmmi Jicai, an online store that sells edible fungi products under Forasen and Farmmi Liangpin brands; and Farmmi Liangpin Market, an online store that sells edible fungi products under the Farmmi Liangpin and Puyangtang brands, as well as other agricultural products. In addition, the company processes dried mushroom and dried black fungus. It offers its products to restaurants, cafeterias, and local specialty stores, as well as through distributors. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Lishui, China.
